statements: SELECT station_name, entrance_count, exit_count FROM commuter_traffic;
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic WHERE entrance_count > 100;
SELECT station_name, peak_hour_traffic FROM commuter_traffic ORDER BY peak_hour_traffic DESC;
SELECT station_name, entrance_count, exit_count FROM commuter_traffic WHERE entrance_count < 50 AND exit_count > 30;
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic WHERE station_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic WHERE peak_hour_traffic > 500 ORDER BY peak_hour_traffic DESC;
SELECT station_name, entrance_count FROM commuter_traffic WHERE entrance_count > 100 AND exit_count > 50;
SELECT station_id, station_name, entrance_count, exit_count, peak_hour_traffic FROM commuter_traffic WHERE entrance_count < 50 OR exit_count < 20 ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT station_id, station_name, entrance_count, exit_count, peak_hour_traffic FROM commuter_traffic WHERE entrance_count > 200 AND peak_hour_traffic BETWEEN 300 AND 600 ORDER BY station_id DESC;
SELECT station_name, entrance_count, exit_count FROM commuter_traffic WHERE entrance_count = exit_count AND peak_hour_traffic < 100;
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic;
SELECT id, station_name, timestamp FROM station_usage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT station_name, daily_visitors FROM commuter_traffic WHERE daily_visitors > 100 ORDER BY daily_visitors DESC;
SELECT station_name, date, time, entry_count, exit_count FROM station_usage WHERE date = '2022-01-30';
SELECT MAX(daily_visitors) AS max_daily_visitors FROM commuter_traffic;
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic WHERE daily_visitors > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT station_name, daily_visitors FROM commuter_traffic WHERE daily_visitors > 200 GROUP BY station_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT station_name, daily_visitors, COUNT(*) AS traffic_count FROM commuter_traffic GROUP BY station_name ORDER BY traffic_count DESC
SELECT station_name, SUM(daily_visitors) AS total_visitors FROM commuter_traffic GROUP BY station_name HAVING total_visitors > 500
SELECT station_name, AVG(daily_visitors) AS avg_visitors FROM commuter_traffic GROUP BY station_name HAVING AVG(daily_visitors) > 50
SELECT * FROM stations;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM stations WHERE station_id = '1234';
SELECT commuter_name, commuter_age FROM commuters WHERE commuter_gender = 'Female';
SELECT station_name, station_location, COUNT(trip_id) AS total_trips FROM stations LEFT JOIN trips ON stations.station_id = trips.station_id GROUP BY station_name, station_location;
SELECT * FROM trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC, trip_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM stations LIMIT 10;
SELECT commuter_name, commuter_age FROM commuters WHERE commuter_gender = 'Male';
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM stations ORDER BY station_location DESC;
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, trip_time FROM trips WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM stations s JOIN trips t ON s.station_id = t.station_id WHERE s.station_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic ORDER BY entry_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM stations WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT station_id, report_date, total_entries + total_exits AS total_traffic FROM traffic_reports WHERE total_entries > 100 ORDER BY total_traffic DESC;
SELECT station_id, activity_date, total_entries FROM station_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT commuter_id, station_id, entry_time, exit_time FROM commuter_traffic WHERE commuter_id = 100 AND station_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM commuter_traffic WHERE commuter_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM stations WHERE station_id = 5;
SELECT report_date, total_entries FROM traffic_reports WHERE station_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT station_id, activity_date, total_entries, total_exits FROM station_activity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT station_id, COUNT(entry_time) AS total_entries, COUNT(exit_time) AS total_exits FROM commuter_traffic GROUP BY station_id HAVING total_entries > 10 AND total_exits < 5 ORDER BY total_entries DESC;
SELECT * FROM Commuter_Stations;
SELECT station_name, city FROM Commuter_Stations WHERE state='NY';
SELECT * FROM Commuter_Trains ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT train_name, route FROM Commuter_Trains WHERE capacity > 200 ORDER BY train_id ASC;
SELECT station_name, city, state FROM Commuter_Stations WHERE city='Boston' OR city='Chicago';
SELECT * FROM Commuter_Trains WHERE capacity > 200 ORDER BY train_id DESC;
SELECT station_name, city, state FROM Commuter_Stations WHERE city = 'New York' OR state = 'California';
SELECT train_name, route FROM Commuter_Trains JOIN Commuter_Schedules ON Commuter_Trains.train_id = Commuter_Schedules.train_id WHERE arrival_time < '10:00' AND departure_time > '14:00';
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM Commuter_Passengers WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 35 ORDER BY passenger_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_name, traffic_count, date FROM Commuter_Stations JOIN Commuter_Traffic ON Commuter_Stations.station_id = Commuter_Traffic.station_id WHERE date = '2022-09-30';
